title: Twitter goes down as blackout hits London and Manchester
text:
Twitter has gone down (Getty)

Twitter is apparently suffering a mass outage that seems to be centered around London and Manchester.

The platform failed to load for us here at Metro.co.uk and a flood of complaints have surfaced on DownDetector, which measures dropouts on popular websites and services.

Although DownDetector has the epicenters listed as London and Manchester, other UK cities like Glasgow also appear to be affected.

‘Brexit just killed twitter,’ wrote one user on DownDetector.

‘”Something went wrong” – I think the idiocy going on in the House of Commons has killed Twitter!’ wrote another.

The current state of the Twitter outage in the UK (Down Detector)

Twitter is usually one of the more resilient platforms with users flocking to it whenever one of the big social networks suffers an outage.

Metro.co.uk has contacted Twitter for a comment and will update this story when we receive a response.
